channel.title: Custom BM Backgrounds
channel.description:
Can someone please make a menu background (animated, map) from these scenes (screenshots).
If possible, the camera view on the maps will be at the same angle I shot the pictures. Some of them really look cool as a background like WgH and OaR. Advanced thank you!
![](upload://bM6beLqlkD0kwrmumxlFBgBxQZI.jpeg)![](upload://zhpYk5gF3JEdowX45Dylrufu1bv.jpeg)![](upload://yBw89kjnSuYkRXAvT7IutgaADdL.jpeg)![](upload://dv9HlNXaQsiZR5RaHJXDxOtclvL.jpeg)![](upload://2wJuQJx2w4P6WQKu5wQsNJNypt9.jpeg)![](upload://EUXyofCB7kburcQDsLsCTKripD.jpeg)![](upload://3gA9Pxc8cXAbKtjtg0YR2xD8x1d.jpeg) I think those scenes look cool to be a background and some especially We've Got Hostiles and On A Rail.
